title: Haiwang Yuan on Yuan Dynasty Secondary Q2

content.question: The author’s assertion in the second paragraph that Chinese people came to believe that “the Yuan had won the Mandate of Heaven” can best be understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: Continuities in Chinese political and cultural traditions
The persistence of Mongol tribal culture following the division of Genghis Khan’s empire
Chinese people’s perception that the Mongols lacked respect for traditional Confucian values
The highly mobile type of warfare practiced by Mongol armies

content.answer: Continuities in Chinese political and cultural traditions

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
